# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a button toggle style.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Discussion

Don’t call this initializer directly. Instead, use the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToggleStyle/button] static variable to create this style:

```swift
Toggle(isOn: $isFlagged) {
    Label("Flag", systemImage: "flag.fill")
}
.toggleStyle(.button)
```
